aka: The Fragments (My Mouth, My Revolt, My Name)
this_title: Les éclats (Ma gueule, ma révolte, mon nom)
trans_title: The Fragments (My Mouth, My Revolt, My Name)
introduction: For more than four years Sylvain George recorded at the refugees stranded in the French port of Calais. Fragments of voices, laughter and rage, snatches of words, images and memory; the breath of the wind, the sun at the sunset, the reflection red-blood; the raids of the police, for a map of the violence inflicted on migrants.源自：https://47.mostra.org/en/filmes/fragmentos-minha-boca-minha-revolta-meu-nome-47a
foreign_title: Les éclats (Ma gueule, ma révolte, mon nom)
